Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Observable
game.Game
public class Game
extends Observable
The type Game. Game is the main class that supervise the whole game. It is a singleton.

      private boolean verifyScores()
      Verify the scores This function verify the score of each player to know the current state of the game
      Returns:
      true if at least 1 player has at least 5 points, false otherwise

      Get random integer in a given interval This function is a utility function used to get a random integer between 2 limits (included)
      Parameters:
      min - the minimum value to be returned (included)
      max - the maximum value to be returned (included)
      Returns:
      random integer in the interval
